```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(targets)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, out.height="700px"}
studyarea <- 
  tar_read(selected_studyarea) %>% 
  st_simplify(dTolerance = 0.45)

colour_values <-
  studyarea %>% 
  nrow() %>%
  hues::iwanthue()

studyarea %>%
  mapview(zcol = "region_name", col.regions = colour_values, lwd = 0, layer.name = "Spatial coverage (labels corresponding to file names)")
```
